name: Away (itch) (Aullwen, hmidoukourouk, AdrienBrds, Titi Monky)
description:
Away is a toy where you can guide a little chunk of land that grows in the time. No rules, no obligation, Away allow you to do whatever you want and discover all the secrets of your unique creations !

Away purpose you a poetic and delicate sound immersion all around your world. An endless possibilities giving free rein to your imagination ! All in an relaxing and enchanting atmosphere.

Start a game, guide, stop or terraform the proceduraly generated island, fly in your poetic and sweet world.

Your tools :

The guide : click multiple times to guide the generation of the island and create awesome shapes.

The destructor : click to destruct a part of your creation.

The modifier : click to transform your ground in something new and discover all the secrets interactions.

Project made for school projet.

Credits :

  • Adrien Bordes
  • Pierre Marcos
  • Théo Calvez
  • Titouan Porteau

Controls :

  • WASD : move camera
  • Right click : rotate camera
  • Left click : use tools
  • Left click + space : use multiple time tools

Note : capture are saved in your Appdata>LocalLow>AwayData

Made with Unity 2019 and FMOD
